special_text:
Level up {BG} [i]({BG}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)[/i] [1/2]
[level 1-3] {T}: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand that was put there from your library this turn. [2/3]
[level 4+] {T}: Return all cards from your graveyard to your hand that were put there from your library this turn. [3/4]
